text:
Krzana | London, UK | Full Time | Onsite

Krzana provides tools for journalists to find and research news stories.

We care about journalism. We run an NLU pipeline that processes most of the real-time news and social media content on the web.

We're looking for full-stack developers in both junior and mid-senior level roles.

We have a strong in-house training culture and are building products beyond the edge of existing tech. We are more interested in intelligence, motivation and problem solving ability than experience. An interest in natural languages, politics, sport or journalism will help.

Details and application: https://angel.co/krzana/jobs
